LanguageData.VMEu_StartInsertionPlasticDesc: Bring a liquid plastic to the processor to start processing.
LanguageData.VMEu_CancelBringingPlasticDesc: Cancel bringing liquid plastic to the processor.
LanguageData.VMEu_PondHasOil: This oil pond has {0} units of dark oil left
LanguageData.VMEu_MustPlaceOnOilPond: The oil extractor needs to be built on top of a oil pond
LanguageData.VMEu_ExtractorProducing: The extractor will produce {0} units of dark oil in {1}
